DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Total Years Have Smoked Cigarettes Year Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the total years a person has smoked cigarettes not including any time they may have stayed off cigarettes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Total Years Have Smoked Cigarettes
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A question about the total years an individual smoked or currently smokes cigarettes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about the total years an individual smoked or currently smokes cigarettes.

Concepts.definition: A question about the total years an individual smoked or currently smokes cigarettes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.changeDescription: . Added 0 in for deci place.  No version needed. AK 10/2/13

ReferenceDocuments.name: How many total years have you
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many total years have you smoked (or did you smoke) cigarettes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Use Note
ReferenceDocuments.description: DCP-specific CDE. Use CDE 5285991 if you are using the full NCI-AACR C-TUQ: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter a whole number (i.e. "4") only. Do not enter a range or fraction.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many total years have you smoked (or did you smoke) cigarettes? Do not count any time you may have stayed off cigarettes. (Years (If you smoked less than one year, write 1.))

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-3
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many total years have you smoked (or did you smoke) cigarettes? Do not count any time you may have stayed off cigarettes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many total years have you smoked (or did you smoke) cigarettes? Do not count any time you may have stayed off cigarettes.  _______ Years (If you smoked less than one year, write "1".)

DataElement.origin: C-TUQ:Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire. NCI-AACR Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Assessment Task Force, 6/19/2015
DataElement.changeDescription: DCP-specific CDE. Use CDE 5285991 if you are using the full NCI-AACR C-TUQ: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire. 4/18/17  ST
